Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: don953
Reviews.Content: Poor quality camera, even for a cheap one.  Cannot take even acceptable pictures.  Also, does not come with an SD card, which is required.  And will only read a 1GB card or less.  Those are not available through most outlets any more.  Even the seller didn't carry them or have any idea where to get one.  Don't waste your money on this one.  Not even an acceptable childrens camera.
